Text: Cool torrent! Remember reading an issue or two of this series when I was little. Can't wait to read this collection! Thank you!

yeah it's good stuff. i never read it until the essential marvel tpb came out several years ago. of course that was in black & white ... the set up to the shroud story is great (not the origin, but the entire "i'm gonna kill __ ____" idea ... enjoy!
also want to quickly mention x-factor peter david had a stroke last week, and i hope TPB folks will send him prayers or just good thoughts for a speedy recovery!

you're a nice person... keep up the awesomeness

& will do
